org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
Class AeSQLJournalStorage

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeSQLObject
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeAbstractSQLStorage
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeSQLJournalStorage
public class AeSQLJournalStorage
extends AeAbstractSQLStorage

A SQL journal storage. Used to write journal entries to a SQL database.
